an5.224:1.3: Āvāsamaccharī hoti, kulamaccharī hoti, lābhamaccharī hoti, vaṇṇamaccharī hoti, dhammamaccharī hoti.
an5.224:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā atinivāse.
an5.224:2.3: Na āvāsamaccharī hoti, na kulamaccharī hoti, na lābhamaccharī hoti, na vaṇṇamaccharī hoti, na dhammamaccharī hoti.
an5.224:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṁsā samavatthavāse”ti.
